thought: To craft a quartz pillar, I first need to craft quartz blocks. This requires 4 quartz which can be crafted from nether_quartz_ore. Therefore I will first smelt some nether_quartz_ore from slot 12 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 12 to slot 11 with quantity 1
